QuestData.Title: Malign Inspiration
QuestData.Description: A long time ago, there was a maiden.$b$bA precocious child fond of song, she made it her hobby to shadow my every move. Charming at first.$b$bWalking on the pier's edge, she became entangled within the ropes surrounding a leering idol. At that time a tremor ran through the waves, giving the small push needed to send them both beneath the surface.$b$bI can hear her song still. At first I thought it a passing fancy, music upon the waves. I realize now the voice comes with sinister purpose.$b$bShe must die.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She is one of theirs now, their wretched queen!
